2021

Note: Once again, due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the uncertainty surrounding restrictions in Alberta, Sled Island was not able to return in full force in 2021. In an effort to have a safe, scaled-down event, we introduced Camp Sled Island - a three-day, in-person event primarily featuring video programming, which ran August 19-21 at Beltline's High Park. This included pre-recorded performances, film screenings, special guest video appearances, and animated shorts displayed on a big screen, as well as a live music pre-show each night.

LIVE MUSIC PRE-SHOW

Aladean Kheroufi, Indigo Rose, Samantha Savage Smith, Uyemi, Wyatt C. Louis

SPECIAL PRE-RECORDED SETS
